Title: wordShingleMinHashArgCaseInsensitiveUTF8
Description: Splits a UTF-8 string into parts (shingles) of shinglesize words each and returns the shingles with minimum and maximum word hashes, calculated by the wordShingleMinHashCaseInsensitiveUTF8 function with the same input. Is case insensitive.

string — String. String.shinglesize — The size of a word shingle. Optional. Possible values: any number from 1 to 25. Default value: 3. UInt8.hashnum — The number of minimum and maximum hashes used to calculate the result. Optional. Possible values: any number from 1 to 25. Default value: 6. UInt8.
Tuple with two tuples with hashnum word shingles each. Tuple(Tuple(String), Tuple(String)).
Examples: SELECT wordShingleMinHashArgCaseInsensitiveUTF8('ClickHouse® is a column-oriented database management system (DBMS) for online analytical processing of queries (OLAP).', 1, 3) AS Tuple;
EffectiveSQLsRefined: SELECT wordShingleMinHashArgCaseInsensitiveUTF8('ClickHouse® is a column-oriented database management system (DBMS) for online analytical processing of queries (OLAP).', 1, 3) AS Tuple;
